summary: SummaryCeraVe Acne Clay-to-Foam Facial Cleanser with advanced salicylic acid deposition technology offers the power of a full OTC acne routine in 1 comforting formula to clear acne and help prevent new breakouts: daily cleanser, weekly clay mask & overnight acne spot treatment.
details: DetailsFeaturesThis 3-in-1 clay cleanser can be used as a daily¬†facial cleanser,¬†mask, and¬†acne spot treatment. The unique kaolin clay formula transforms into a gentle foaming cleanser that is suitable for sensitive acne-prone skin.Visibly improves¬†acne¬†pimples in 3 days*.¬†100% of consumers agree this product feels soothing on skin after 6 weeks of use as a 2x daily cleanser and a 2x weekly mask.Combines 2%¬†salicylic acid¬†with 24H hydration from ceramides and glycerin to relieve redness and soothe skin.Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help maintain the skin‚Äôs natural barrier.From the #1 dermatologist recommended acne brand in the USDEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS & #1 DERMATOLOGIST RECOMMENDED SKINCARE BRANDCeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.Item 2640163How To UseDaily Face Wash: Massage onto damp face. Rinse.Weekly Mask (2x/week): Apply an even layer to clean, damp face. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse.Spot Treatment: Apply to blemishes as needed.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.IngredientsWater, Glycerin, Kaolin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Cetyl Alcohol, Niacinamide, Glycolipids, Carrageenan, Beta-Glucan, Ceramide Np, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Eop, Carbomer, Triethyl Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Cholesterol, Caprylyl Glycol, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Lactic Acid, Chitosan, Phytosphingosine, Xanthan Gum, Benzoic Acid.
how_to_use: Daily Face Wash: Massage onto damp face. Rinse.Weekly Mask (2x/week): Apply an even layer to clean, damp face. Leave on for 10 minutes. Rinse.Spot Treatment: Apply to blemishes as needed.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.headline: Leaves my skin very soft and smooth
reviews.comments: I really like the CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser! It's gentle, but it still does a great job of cleaning the skin. The cleanser has a creamy texture that turns into a foam when you lather it up, and it leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. Plus, it doesn't dry out my skin like some other cleansers can.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Works very well! cleans face well! super good for sensitive skin! scent isn't to strong and good value for money! ingredients are good and nothing bad! packaging is good! Great product to try

reviews.headline: did not do a significant difference
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] i like this cleanser but i did not notice a huge change in my skin in order to repurchase this product. everyones skin is different so i would give this product a try if you are looking for a new cleanser

reviews.headline: Great for oily skin
reviews.comments: My skin is very oily and this cleanser does a nice job of cleaning my face, without stripping moisture. My skin feels soft and smooth after using it. I appreciate the packaging, especially how it is stored, making it easy to use. I have been using it nightly!

reviews.headline: Great both ways
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I really enjoyed this cleanser. It made my face feel squeaky clean after using it. I also really liked using it as a face mask. It felt very refreshing and cooling to use it.

reviews.headline: Refreshing
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Great cleanser! It's so refreshing to cleanse my face at night when it feels grimy and oily from the day. There's definitely a lot of product in there to last a while. Does what it's supposed to!

reviews.headline: I would love to buy this again
reviews.comments: Wonderful product

reviews.headline: Great ingredients for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a great wash for acne prone skin! I've only been using it for a couple weeks but I'm already enjoying it. It's has so many uses too, it's a cleaner and a clay mask. Works great for the blackheads on my nose. I also really love the texture.

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product works very well and has been helping manage my acne. It isn't heavily scented so it's perfect for people who are sensitive to scents. The packing is really nice with a twist on lid. Overall I would say it's a good value for your money.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review but I do love it! It's a helpful, gentle face wash for people who want fewer pimples and cleaner skin. It has a light scent and also comes in a good sized bottle as you don't need to use that much!

reviews.headline: AMAZING CLEANSER!
reviews.comments: this cleanser is amazing. it is so good for the price and leaves my skin feeling smooth. it helps prevent breakout and the texture is nice.

reviews.headline: Very good!
reviews.comments: I haven't been able to find a good cleanser thay doesn't break me out! I love that it's 3-n-1 as well! It's so good!

reviews.headline: Good acne cleanser for dry skin
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. The texture is very smooth and the scent is prominently coconut.  It is a nice cleanser but felt the need to double cleanse. It's non-drying which is a plus. It did not foam, for a clay to foam cleanser, that is a downside. It did not foam, and I tried different ways to get it to foam. The packaging is sturdy but the cap is very small and can be difficult to put on for people with disabilities. A little goes a long way, so it's a good value.

reviews.headline: Decent face wash
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Not too expensive for a face wash. The packaging is simple but i would love a pump more. No scent which is also nice. The ingredients don't look bad and my skin felt effectively clean.

reviews.headline: It works for acne !
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This product as a face wash has worked better for me in a week than Panoxyl face wash has in two years. The packaging could use some work as I don't like the twist cap.

reviews.headline: Good basic salicylic acid cleanser! üßº
reviews.comments:
CeraVe is great at making simple, non-abrasive cleansers and this is definitely included! I loved that this foam cleanser was easy to apply and the only thing I was missing was, well.. something harsher! Because salicylic acid is a touchy ingredient and cannot be mixed with retinoids or other common acids, I personally prefer stronger acids for my acne. But this is great for gentler routines and I would definitely recommend it as a basic and/or starter cleanser so long as you don't already use something that doesn't react well with it. ü´°

I received this product at no cost in exchange for my honest review. Thank you again, CeraVe! ü´∂üèΩ

reviews.headline: Great for Oily, Acne-Prone Skin
reviews.comments: I've been using the CeraVe Acne Clay to Foam Cleanser for a couple weeks, and it's made a big difference. It starts as a clay, then foams up nicely and leaves my skin feeling clean but not dry. It's helped reduce breakouts without irritation. Definitely a solid everyday cleanser for oily or acne-prone skin.

reviews.headline: Great for acne prone skin!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This face wash has tremendously improved my skin! I use it twice a week as a wash in the shower and leave it on for five minutes. Then I use it as a face mask once weekly and leave it on for 10 minutes or until it turns clear. It hasn't dried my face up or caused any irritation. I LOVE this product

reviews.headline: Gentle but Effective!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] 

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è 

The CeraVe Acne Clay to Foam Cleanser has been a total game-changer for me! I love how it starts as a clay, giving that deep clean feeling, then turns into a foam that rinses off so easily without leaving my skin dry or tight. It really helps keep my breakouts under control while still being gentle enough for everyday use. My skin feels fresh, smooth, and balanced after every wash. Definitely a new favorite in my skincare routine!

reviews.headline: Cera Ve is wonderful!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I ABSOLUTELY LOVE this product. Vera be provides the best skin care that you can ensure won't make you breakout or get a rash. The texture is so smooth and feels great on your face. Not to mention, this product is of great value because it provides 3 products for the price of one. I used to work in dermatology so I have tried MANY different cleansers and I have to say this is one of my absolute favorites!

faceoff_positive.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I have never tried anything as good as CeraVe's Clay to Foam Acne Cleanser, and I am pleasantly surprised by its performance. Despite having many other cleansers, I keep reaching for this drugstore option every morning and night for the past two months. It truly outperforms my high-end options, as it lathers like a dream, and I have noticed a significant improvement in my skin.

Although I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review, the results speak for themselves. For reference, I have combination, sensitive, and acne-prone skin. I was initially nervous about the clay in the formula potentially drying out the drier areas of my face, but it is surprisingly hydrating for those parts while effectively controlling oil in my T-zone.

I appreciate that this cleanser is barrier-friendly, formulated with salicylic acid, ceramides, and glycerin. It does a great job of deep-cleaning makeup and oil from the day without causing any irritation or a tight feeling on my skin. Plus, there's no scent and the value for the amount you get is outstanding. 

Another great feature of this cleanser is that it can also be used as a face mask or spot treatment, and a little goes a long way, which I appreciate. Great for someone who doesn't want clutter and wants to get the most out of a product. 

If you have acne-prone, sensitive skin like mine, I highly recommend trying this cleanser! I will definitely be purchasing it again as soon as I run out.
faceoff_positive.headline: High-end feeling cleanser that does it all!

faceoff_negative.comments:
The Cerave Acne to Foam Cleanser is said to have the convenience of 3 acne treatments in 1 comforting formula; daily cleanser, weekly mask, and overnight spot treatment. Putting all my separate products aside that I normally use to treat acne, I tested this product for a week, day and night like I normally would with a cleanser.

I have quite sensitive and dehydrated combination skin with occasional dry patches near my chin and mouth area, as well as my forehead. 

What I didn't like about this product was that although it was dedicated to those with sensitive skin, it still had an awful medicinal scent which caused my skin to turn red after washing it off. It is thick, but easy to spread out, however, I did not notice any difference in terms of decreasing my acne and removing scars. However, if this were to be used as a simple cleanser, then this might work for those without sensitive skin. 

Unfortunately, this did not work for me, and I personally would not recommend it.
faceoff_negative.headline: Innovative, but ineffective
